archimate:Principle.name: Security by Design
archimate:Principle.documentation: A widely recognized set of principles for building security into systems, products, and services from the very start. Specific Sovrin Security by Design principles are a subset of the Core Principles in the Sovrin Governance Framework.

properties.value: (c) 2019 by Sovrin Foundation. This work is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution- ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
